title: Someone on my Account?
body:
Hey guys - 

i just had a question: I logged into my account recently and automatically loaded into a lobby. I’ve had my account compromised before so I was worried that loding automatically into a game queue lobby meant that someone was on my account and that I probably logged them out of it - 

My question I guess is, is this actually an indicator of someone having been on my account, or am I just being overly paranoid? Is it possible to log in and just be in a lobby already? 
 
I’ve changed my password to be safe, but I really wanted to double check. 

Thanks!

replies.body: Mmmmm I'd say you were probably taking the rights steps by changing your password! There's not really any reason why you would load straight into a match or lobby without having kicked someone else off. I would be extra safe and hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
@broporo Can you answer me i got a question buddy
